title: Enhancing Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Simulation-Based Experiential Learning Design for Elementary Social Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners complete a simulation-based experiential learning design plan within one week that meets the requirements of each phase of the 4D model (Define-Design-Develop-Diffuse) and pass at least four of the five expert review checklist items for final submission.
They develop three or more experiential activity scenarios using social studies simulations in an online environment.
They verify the applicability of simulation learning design proposals through peer evaluation.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
